Package com.intellij.xdebugger.frame

Interface XValueNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Obsolescent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WatchNodeImpl, XValueNodeImpl, XValueNodePresentationConfigurator.ConfigurableXValueNodeImpl

    public interface XValueNode
extends Obsolescent
    Represents a node in debugger tree. This interface isn't supposed to be implemented by a plugin.
    See Also:
    XValue

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_VALUE_LENGTH
      If value text exceeds this constant it's recommended to truncate it and use setFullValueEvaluator(XFullValueEvaluator) method to provide full value

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFullValueEvaluator(XFullValueEvaluator fullValueEvaluator)
      If string representation of the value is too long to show in the tree pass truncated value to setPresentation(Icon, String, String, boolean) method and call this method to provide full value.

      Setup presentation of the value

      Deprecated. 
      use setPresentation(Icon, XValuePresentation, boolean)

      Setup presentation of the value.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intellij.xdebugger.Obsolescent

        isObsolete

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_VALUE_LENGTH

        static final int MAX_VALUE_LENGTH
        If value text exceeds this constant it's recommended to truncate it and use setFullValueEvaluator(XFullValueEvaluator) method to provide full value
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setPresentation

        void setPresentation(javax.swing.Icon icon,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String value,
                     boolean hasChildren)
        Setup presentation of the value
        Parameters:
        icon - icon representing value type (see AllIcons.Debugger)
        type - optional type of the value, it is shown in gray color and surrounded by braces
        value - string representation of value. It is also used in 'Copy Value' action
        hasChildren - false if the node is a leaf

      • setPresentation

        void setPresentation(javax.swing.Icon icon,
                     XValuePresentation presentation,
                     boolean hasChildren)
        Setup presentation of the value. This method allows to change separator between name and value and customize the way value text is shown
        Parameters:
        icon - icon representing value type (see AllIcons.Debugger)
        presentation - a new XValuePresentation instance which determines how the value is show
        hasChildren - false if the node is a leaf

      • setPresentation

        @Deprecated
void setPresentation(javax.swing.Icon icon,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String separator,
                     java.lang.String value,
                     boolean hasChildren)
        Deprecated. use setPresentation(Icon, XValuePresentation, boolean)

      • setFullValueEvaluator

        void setFullValueEvaluator(XFullValueEvaluator fullValueEvaluator)
        If string representation of the value is too long to show in the tree pass truncated value to setPresentation(Icon, String, String, boolean) method and call this method to provide full value. This will add a link to the node and show popup with full value if an user clicks on that link.
        Parameters:
        fullValueEvaluator - will be used to obtain full text of the value
        See Also:
        MAX_VALUE_LENGTH
